Package com.paydiant.android.core.domain.offer

Contains the domain classes used for the lite versions of offer summary and offer detail method calls.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptancePartner
    Contains the information about the offer acceptance partner.
    FilterParameters
    Defines the offer filtering parameters.
    LocationFilter
    Defines the location filtering parameters.
    Offer
    Offer details.
    OfferArtifact
    Defines the offer artifact details.
    OfferCampaign
    Contains the detailed information about an offer campaign.
    OfferCampaignRedemptionSchedule
    Contains the redemption scheduling information for a offer campaign.
    OfferCampaignRedemptionSpecification
    Contains the rules (specification) for offer redemptions.
    OfferCampaignRedemptionSummary
    Contains details about offer campaign redemptions.
    OfferCampaignSponsor
    Contains information about the sponsor of an offer campaign.
    OfferCampaignSummary
    Provides summarized information about offer campaigns.
    OfferCampaignSummaryFilterParameters
    Contains the filtering parameters for offer campaigns.
    OfferCampaignSummaryList
    Holds the list of offer campaigns.
    OfferCategory
    Contains properties related to an offer category.
    OfferReward
    Contains information about the offer reward.
    OfferSummary
    Offer summary information.
    OfferSummaryFilterParameters
    Contains offer summary filtering parameters.
    OfferSummaryList
    Contains the list of offer summary information.

Package com.paydiant.android.core.domain.offer Description

Contains the domain classes used for the lite versions of offer summary and offer detail method calls.
Since:
5.5.0.1
